website_summaries.verdict: Meal bar with plant-based proteins and mostly organic ingredients that taste great.
pros: Free from both gluten and soy, while also being non-GMO
Fiber from chia and flax seeds
Scrumptious ingredients are at least 70% organic
cons: Calorie content and price are higher than average

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED IN ITEMS PRICES
customer_reviews.text: One star is for over priced item. The taste is great and having lots of nuts in each single bar. However, I have discovered that I could have gotten this item for $10 less. I now realize that Amazon's health foods are very expensive. I would suggest that before any customer buy anything at Amazon, please do some comparison shopping-- you will be surprised. I wish I had done that before I bought the PRO BAR Meal from them. I blame myself for not being an educated consumer when it comes to Amazon. Amazon, you have opened my eyes. Thank you!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Kellyman

customer_reviews.title: Bars came in christmas wrapping
customer_reviews.text: I like ProBars, they are great. However, this review is reflective of the seller, not the bar producer. These bars came in a box covered in Christmas wrapping paper, which is concerning considering its October. I checked the expiration date which is fine, but they are still stale. The bars feel like they've around the world and back. They are hard and greasy, almost inedible. Don't get ripped off. I threw them all away because the seller does not except returns. $40 down the drain. Criminal.
customer_reviews.author: John Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Need to seriously look at their bulk packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love the ProBar meal bars, but I am seriously upset about the waste in their bulk packaging. They recently revised their packaging and it now comes with 6 food bars in a solid cardboard box. Before the bars came packaged in a paper box. The concern is the size of the box is immensely wasteful. The box that came with 6 food bars is able to hold 16!!! It's a nice way to consolidate, but in this day there's no reason to have excess packaging.....especially when ordering from Amazon. They need to seriously rethink their bulk packaging. I want to pay for the food bars, not excess packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Designerman

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and nutritious
customer_reviews.text: Pros: filling, not too sweet, good taste, nutritious, portable, no soy, nightshades, or sugar alcohols; easily digested Cons: a bit high in sugar, pricey, high in calories, depending on the batch, a bar can have an unfortunate green powder taste. Bottom line: These bars are a good choice for the occasional meal replacement or snack. Superberry is the best flavor in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: RedheadwalkingTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Tastes fine, good size, but not as big as depicted.
customer_reviews.text: They taste fine and are fairly filling. I eat one for breakfast after my workout. I'm not big on breakfast so I use these as a way to get myself to eat at least something. I got them since the price per gram was good, but do not be deceived by the picture they have of a person holding the package. The bar is not that big and about a third of the package is air. See the pic I posted.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Delicious! Perfect meal replacement when you're on the go!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these... so far I've had the Banana Nut, Chocolate & Peanut Butter, Almond Crunch and Original Trail Mix and every one of them is delicious. Not only do they taste great, they satisfy my hunger and stay with me. I am hypoglycemic, so when I have something high in refined sugar, when I crash I get Hangry, this doesn't happen with these.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley A

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend these to any backpacker
customer_reviews.text: Brought these on a backpacking trip and ate them for breakfast. They're really tasty, calorie dense, and lightweight. Would recommend these to any backpacker.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Same as the old bar
customer_reviews.text: Superfood Slam is still one of my favorite flavors but the new packaging design in the ad is somewhat deceptive. Here's a picture of the old bar next to the new one. They are the exact same size! In fact everything is the same except the packaging. In the one picture in this ad it makes it look like the new bar is massive...nope, same exact size. As others have pointed out the bar is still tiny inside the packaging and barely fills up 1/2 the package. One funny thing they did was now the packaging says 2 servings inside, even though the bar is still exactly the same size as the old 1 serving size.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: There are only 6 in the box.
customer_reviews.text: Buyers beware! This looks like a good deal until the package arrives and you find only 6 bars in the box! I was used to these bars being 12/box and searched the product specs but didn’t see the quantity specified anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Eric K Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Pro bar meal on the Goooo.!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Pro bar,however I was a bit perplexed when I opened the box to see the packaging was changed. At first I thought my order wss wrong somehow. Although the ingredients seem to be equal I noticed the nutrition entries were changed m moved around. Hopefully it may improve quality. The taste is phenomenal. Pro bar is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: PK Bunni

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: These are mostly pretty good, but they include duplicates of the least tasty versions (in my opinion). I assume it's due to pricing, but expect extras of Superfood and Berry. Pretty good bars though, compared to Cliff bars I like these better, however like I said some of the flavors aren't that great. The best is chocolate coconut!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Contains WHEAT they are NOT GF
customer_reviews.text: Celiac folks beware it says gluten free but the ingredients list says contains Wheat, the wheat has been processed to allow this food to meet the FDA definition of Gluten Free Foods. What a waste I bought six boxes and I cannot return them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Esor

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: My whole family is addicted to these!! It’s my sweet fix =) My picky 13 son loves them and he’s very picky about health bars but these really are a great substitute for a snickers with added benefits lol
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Young

customer_reviews.title: Not the same bars and only 7 out of 12
customer_reviews.text: Bought three boxes of the variety pack. Got 7 bars out of twelve in each box. They were not even the bars advertized. Different size and different flavors. 😫 Bought 1 box of 12 and they were great, now the same mistake 3 TIMES 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie L. B. Knotts

customer_reviews.title: Now, this, is, a , good, bar!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bar. It is big enough to satisfy as a meal, and the taste is outstanding. Really, enjoyed it and have bought more. I'm not big on nutrition bars, but a friend told me about these and I rodered them just because he said they were good , and they are reallllly good. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: NanBaker

customer_reviews.title: Missing Third of Order
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pack of 9. However only 6 were shipped. They were shipped in an unsealed box and they are a pain to return...
customer_reviews.author: Zach W. Bawel

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and good ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Really good flavors love the pro bars also quality ingredients which is nice you don’t feel like you’re poisoning yourself by eating a bar. Lol they are more sugar than I prefer but they are good and I’d still recommend they are more of a meal replacement than a bar which is good to keep in mind. They aren’t cheap but you pay for what you get and they have better ingredients than most bars out there on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Lightworker728

customer_reviews.title: 5 bars missing & Different packaging
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed to open the box expecting 12 bars and only got 7. The bars themselves are not the square bars as advertised either. I love ProBar products, so maybe I just got a bad box. No point returning as shipping costs will be more than the money I lost on the items themselves = $10. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Conway

customer_reviews.title: Quality control is lacking!
customer_reviews.text: I found it disturbing that the bottom three bars were in different packaging and another language with only 9 grams of protein (the others are 10 grams). The foreign bar I opened was ROCK hard and crumbling. The quality control is questionable of the products contents and mixed lables!
customer_reviews.author: Like it it

customer_reviews.title: Missing 6 bars
customer_reviews.text: Bars arrived in a bag. Box was opened and it only contained 6 bars. No assortment just one flavor. Need a refund or send me the 6 other bars.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Asael Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bars!
customer_reviews.text: Normally I do not like protein bars, or any kind of fruit bars but I do LOVE these! I got the variety pack and so far tried the original trail mix, banana nut and the fruit one oh my so good. I would have to say I like the original the most so far but the banana nut is awesome and my husband favors that one. I can't wait to try all.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Dos Reis

customer_reviews.title: Shorted
customer_reviews.text: The description says 12 bars but I only received 10. They look delicious but would really like to have all that I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received random, wrong, item
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 12 pack of Peanut Butter Pro Bars, I received a box that had 7 bars, in assorted flavors and then were ProBar Base
customer_reviews.author: Prospect35

customer_reviews.title: Ripped off
customer_reviews.text: I bought a box of 12 meal bars and only got 9 bars in a sealed box
customer_reviews.author: Cesar peralta

customer_reviews.title: The bars are tiny compared to the photos
customer_reviews.text: Utterly misleading photography. The bars are about half the size they appear to be in the pictures, and they cost waaay too much. Taste is fine, nutritional value seems good, but it's a waste of money buying it here and I never buy twice from someone who clearly is out to mislead people. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Peyton

customer_reviews.title: Any other bars """R""" JUNK FOOD!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So, never go hungry or under nurished. These PRO BARS HAVE what it takes to satisfy cravings and supply the essentials for your body to grow and stay healthy. Buy,Buy,Buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Count it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time I ordered this. The first time was good. This second time around, I got only 11 bars instead, plus 1 empty package. Empty. Really...Seriously? So disappointing! .
customer_reviews.author: Heiligenstein101

customer_reviews.title: Will not order again
customer_reviews.text: Not the proper mixture of bars. Also, the item had been previously opened and taped back up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product not what's advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Description says there are 12 bars in the box, but the product contained only 7. Submitted a return and asked for a replacement, but the replacement package contained only 7. No luck so far getting someone at Amazon to make it right. UPDATE: With a lot of poking around and trying dead ends, I reached an actual person at Amazon. She did an outstanding job sorting out the matter, and resolved it. 1 star for the product; 6 stars for her.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: Only 6 bars, not 9
customer_reviews.text: The description advertises 9 bars in the box, but the package arrived with only 6. Will you fulfill the order and send three more bars? I only received 60% of what I paid for. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Aowyn Gierada

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting Protein bar on the market
customer_reviews.text: I've tried every protein bar there is and there is no comparison. Most are either too sugary and no protein or terrible tasting and protein. They taste natural, like an actual breakfast on the go, unlike most protein bars that taste like a chalky candy bar. They are on the high-end price wise but they are worth it in my opinion. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bjbarbarasuej

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong ProMeal bar. I asked for Oatmeal Chocolate Chip and received Coconut Chocolate chip that was so stale I could hardly bite into it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M.

customer_reviews.title: Not the tastiest
customer_reviews.text: I've only tried the Mocha Almond Fudge so that's what I'm basing my review on. It's somewhat edible but it wouldn't be my first choice. I guess it's acceptable as an emergency/survival food. I know that my oldest boy wouldn't eat it. Well, maybe he would if this is all we had to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Lee R.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite flavor
customer_reviews.text: I love to stash these in my purse just in case I’m stuck in a situation where I need to eat. These bars are very filling and delicious. Sometimes I’ll split this with my son. It won’t leave a crumbly mess or stuck to your teeth like other bars.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: large selection
customer_reviews.text: Variety pack ideal emergency preparedness and survival food they are ready to eat, with no preparation required! They are also great for outdoor activities such as camping, hunting, hiking, biking, fishing, RV and motorcycle road trips, and general outdoor recreation. They have a large selection of high quality PROBAR👍
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Morales

customer_reviews.title: Great cold food option
customer_reviews.text: These are great for meal replacement on backpacking trips. They taste good, have a good amount of calories, are a realistic size (3oz), are fairly low in sugar, and are affordable. Goodbye Clif bars, Kind bars, and Bobos bars, hello Probars
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Bars for a Quick Meal
customer_reviews.text: Been a fan of these bars for years. Wholeberry blast is favorite. I keep these bars around for an emergency meal for cycling and hiking. Always tasty when you're in need of a quick meal. Most of the other flavors are good too.
customer_reviews.author: Matt K

customer_reviews.title: Really great taste.  A lot cheaper to buy on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I thought about going to Amazon to buy these because I go to my local health food store and buy them and it is a lot more expensive. These are absolutely delicious and the super Berry is my favorite flavor. I love that its organic and GMO free
customer_reviews.author: Bree Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Great for an on-the-go purse meal vs snack.
customer_reviews.text: If you already carry snacks/meal replacements, have to eat on the run, travel or are just busy, these meal replacement bars are tasty, fairly nutritious, save time & are easily portable. They're not pretty, but they're tasty. Especially nice to have the healthier option when there's nothing but vending machine or drive-thru options. All the flavors are fairly true to the flavor description.
customer_reviews.author: B.G.

customer_reviews.title: Really liked these
customer_reviews.text: I bought the PROBAR variety pack for camping trips. Each variety taste good and the texture was nice. Body felt good after eating. They are heavy enough to fill you up as a breakfast. Good for a snack too. I would def buy again and not just for camping.
customer_reviews.author: Capt Bob

customer_reviews.title: WE ONLY GOT 9 OUT OF THE 12 WHEN ARE THE OTHER 3 COMING
customer_reviews.text: We got our order and only received 9 bars when are the 3 coming?
customer_reviews.author: KIM M CARR

customer_reviews.title: Loved by the US Air Force
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is currently deployed overseas and she's having a hard time having the TIME to eat. So I sent these to her. SHE LOVES them!!! I'm so thankful for the fast shipping and great product.
customer_reviews.author: ncarnes

customer_reviews.title: They taste okay but they're all pretty sweet, and kind of taste the same
customer_reviews.text: I pack Probars as meal replacements for mountaineering trips where you have to snack on the go. They taste okay but they're all pretty sweet, and kind of taste the same. The peanut butter Probars taste almost identical to the berry pro bars. I would like these better if they were a little less sweet, but they pack down small and if they get smashed in your bag they're still easy to eat. If you're going camping maybe only bring a couple of these along, you won't want to eat them every day.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Dean

customer_reviews.title: Box was opened/unsealed when received!
customer_reviews.text: I have had Probar in the past. The product is great. I just couldn't believe that the box was not sealed when received. Poor packaging, especially during a pandemic!
customer_reviews.author: S. Ly

customer_reviews.title: Best meal bar for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best meal bar I have had. Tried many different brands. These bars have chunks of fruit, nuts, and grains so you can tell they are actually real food and not processed bars. Flavor of the fruit bars are great. I would have rated these a 5 star but I have only tried a couple different flavors so far. Buy the variety pack so you can decide the best for you. 12 bars for less than $2 a piece. You wont be disappointed. I am reordering when this sample pack is done. Clean product, well balanced nutrition, good price, great flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S

customer_reviews.title: I love these things!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these things!!! so good and great ingredients!!! I know this might sound crazy, but I went on an extreme hiking/camping trip for one month and only ate these and protein powder!! you'd would think Iwound get sick of them, but I didn't!!! I craved more!! Not only that I felt great and had tons of energy!! I have nothing bad to say!! Five Stars!!! I would definitely recommend this product!! Aaa nnn ddd I must say!! I'm The LumberJack
customer_reviews.author: LumberJack

customer_reviews.title: Best energy bar in the market
customer_reviews.text: I think the probar is the best energy bar in the market. I used to eat cliff bars and got sick of those quickly. Probars on the other hand have a pleasant aroma and granulated texture that feel like regular food. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: quad

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: These things are what a Cliff bar was. Higher quality ingredients, less sugar and will hold you all afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: WheezerMF

customer_reviews.title: Great way to start the day
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy a ProBar Meal bar every morning. I have several I enjoy and decided to try the Banana Nut Bread. I was a bit worried it might taste artificial (lots of banana stuff does), I should have known ProBar doesn't do artificial--it tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves them
customer_reviews.text: He's always trying to find a bar that doesn't taste like chemicals. He's trying to gain weight so needs to eat often and these are a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet Janes

customer_reviews.title: Good variety and flavors
customer_reviews.text: That are tasty. A compact meal replacement perfect for the trail, on the go, or at the desk.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I take these to work in case I don’t have time to eat a meal. These do not disappoint. I have liked everyone I have tried so far and work great as a meal replacement. Will use these for camping and hiking as well.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BUT PREFER LESS SUGAR
customer_reviews.text: I like all the Pro Bar Meal flavors I have tasted. They have great textures and flavors, but all are too sweet for me. In today's quick meal market, it's hard to find healthy snacks that are organic and non GMO. For some reason, manufacturers feel that to sell, snacks have to be overloaded with products containing sweeteners. The Peanut Butter Pro Bar seems to be the least sweet of the various flavors, but I would enjoy it more if the sugar content was reduced even further. Some new "flavors" with less sugar would be a hit in my house!
customer_reviews.author: Fatchilipepper

customer_reviews.title: No package quantity in description - this box had 6 instead of 12!
customer_reviews.text: Massively disappointed with the package quantity. Nowhere in the description did it indicate box quantity is 6 instead of 12. Price per count (or oz) is often unreliable. Put the package quantity in the description or photos!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Harris

customer_reviews.title: Fulfilling breakfast, tasty.
customer_reviews.text: I order these about once a month. They are very delicious with high protein. The sugar content is a bit higher than I’d like but I’m sure that’s why they taste so good! Fills me up until lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great bar if you are short on time and eating on the go. The size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and filling
customer_reviews.text: A bit more dates than I might have put in if I was making the recipe, but overall quite tasty. Not low cal, remember these are meal replacement bars, not snack bars. But great to keep in your purse (or car or desk) in case things get busy and you miss lunch. I like that there's no chocolate coating to melt off and get all over the place - these look the same after a week in my purse as they did out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Rocketgal

customer_reviews.title: unfortunate changes
customer_reviews.text: Latest iteration is overpriced and packaging seems wasteful. It used to be 12 for $25 in a paper box, now it's 9 for $25 in a sturdy, unnecessary cardboard box. Taste is great.
customer_reviews.author: Eric A

customer_reviews.title: Good snack replacement when on the road
customer_reviews.text: Good snack bar. They all kind of taste the same but they seem to fill u up. I've never been able to use them as a meal replacement guess I eat too much. They are costly as well.
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: Ew
customer_reviews.text: These taste awful and I'm comparing that to other protein bars. Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sami Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Packed with energy for a small space
customer_reviews.text: great for long cycle rides. I'd suggest though eating 1/3, its pretty thick and youll need to drink water, but also the amount of calories packed into each bar, makes it that you only need to really eat 1/3 every 45 minutes for digestion purposes. But honestly makes it very lightweight and helps from stopping for fuel so much.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey K. Chin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for bike rides and mini meals for years! They are great!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SkyGodSam

customer_reviews.title: They are ok
customer_reviews.text: Filling and tastey. Perfect for your car or to keep in a gym bag.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great meal/snack bar. Added sugar makes it a healthy cookie treat.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Great for backpacking
customer_reviews.text: These calorie-packed bars were great on my recent backpacking trip. Lightweight yet filling! Packed with vitamins and nutrients that I wouldn't get from the typical granola bar. This is truly a meal bar. I keep the extras in my desk at work for when I'm short on time to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Love them. I workout and shower at the gym before work. I keep a couple flavors of these at my desk for breakfast and to snack. Good taste.
customer_reviews.author: Greg B

customer_reviews.title: Wrong ones😅
customer_reviews.text: The first variety pack I got was yummy and kept me content when I didn't have time for a meal. However this time I was sent the wrong ones I got the chocolate bliss protein probars. They are good not what I order or paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Operators shtf snack
customer_reviews.text: Great little bars to put in bug out bags and "operator gear"
customer_reviews.author: Roy Ayers

customer_reviews.title: These actually taste good
customer_reviews.text: These taste better than all others I've tried. I bought the variety pack and it was great trying so many flavors. I liked them all.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for emergency situations or when you can't cook a meal.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Lots of good ingredients, but high in sugar
customer_reviews.text: Lots of good ingredients, but high in sugar. They could easily take a lot out and it'd be sweet enough. Keep this in your glovebox, only the chips would melt. That way you have a decent snack around and you won't waste time and money on fast food.
customer_reviews.author: 'beachfitrob' dot com

customer_reviews.title: Protein bars
customer_reviews.text: These protein meals are fantastic. They taste great! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These came recommended from another triathlete and I love them. I use them as fuel before training and racing. They made a 40-mile training ride effortless. I carry fuel with me too, of course, but these got me off to a great start and sustained me really well. I keep buying them and trying out the different flavors. Koka Moka is my favorite so far.
customer_reviews.author: J. Reese Nottingham

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Vegan travelers
customer_reviews.text: These are a great option for vegans. I travel for a living and can’t count the number of times that have saved me from starving. They’re delicious, relatively nutritious and a much better option than the junk available in most airports. I’ve tried almost all of the flavors and haven’t had a bad one yet.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: They are a good quality bars but they made them much smaller then they used to be
customer_reviews.author: A.D.

customer_reviews.title: The seller sent al 12 bars and all 12 flavors .
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the probars,I love all the different flavors and hit the spot for a snack, I am re ordering the same bars I hope I received all the flavors again as long as I satisfied I will continue to buy the taste is good .
customer_reviews.author: Gordy@66

customer_reviews.title: The Best Backpacker Bars
customer_reviews.text: Great bars for my backpacking trip in the Grand Canyon
customer_reviews.author: Jr Zook

customer_reviews.title: 2 bars is a backpacking lunch
customer_reviews.text: Taste great, lots of calories for getting through a tough afternoon of toting a pack over mountain trails.i usually eat 2 for lunch, different flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great for all occasions
customer_reviews.text: Great for all occasions. I love all the Pro Bars, but I chose this one to buy in bulk because it is highly nutritious and tasty. If you don't have any other flavors to mix it up you may get sick of it. I ate one of these every day backpacking and they were always a welcomed quick snack that actually provided some substance. I have also started to use them as a small breakfast at work if I don't have time to eat before I take off.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Ross

customer_reviews.title: Only received 5 bars!!
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality control. Only received 5 bars (there should be 6) and box was opened. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: T-Dang

customer_reviews.title: Fulfill
customer_reviews.text: I really do like it, but it’s a bit too sweet.
customer_reviews.author: michelle evans

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sport bar!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite bar ever! The taste is excellent and when I am exercising for long hours, I consider them as my treat!
customer_reviews.author: Isabella Smith

customer_reviews.title: Tasty. Wife and Son also like them
customer_reviews.text: This Chocolate Peanut flavor is great. I can get a bar and we can share it due to the size of the bar. The flavor and texture is similar to a cliff bar but better. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious nutritional snack!! Not at all like the cardboard products by some. These are moist, chewy & tasty in a great variety of flavors!! Will definitely order again!!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Peel

customer_reviews.title: Watch it. You'll get addicted.
customer_reviews.text: Very good. A little sugar heavy as far as macros are concerned.
customer_reviews.author: That's Mr Bullet!

customer_reviews.title: Tastey
customer_reviews.text: Very good meal bar use these in my work lunch in place of sandwiches, and they hit the spot and satisfy my stomach till I get home , have 2 in my lunch ,also use on bike rides, this almond crunch is one of my top favorites, it has like a maple syrup taste
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste, satisfying
customer_reviews.text: Love these bars, very tasty. Not too far different from a cliff bar but definitely seems like better ingredients like whole nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Enkode

customer_reviews.title: Good for Pre-Running Fuel
customer_reviews.text: This is the best non-chocolate Pro-Bar in my opinion. It has 390 calories and 11 grams of protein, but since I'm not running huge distances, I usually half it and use it to tide me over when I run right after work. Most of the stores in my area only carry the Berry Blast, which is okay but not great and the Super Food Slam, which I literally have to choke down. And it's also difficult to find them under $3.50 a bar, so buying the box of 12 was the most cost-effective solution.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Jernigan

customer_reviews.title: It really is a Meal Bar
customer_reviews.text: Very filling and the taste is excellent. I usually only eat half at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: PROBAR - Meal Bar
customer_reviews.text: These bars are great as a snack! I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: demfbo1

customer_reviews.title: good snack /  trail bars.
customer_reviews.text: these are tasty and keep me going on the trail. Got tired of Power Bars so tried these. When you open the wrapper they don't have the eye appeal of some bars but taste good, feel good in my mouth and keep me fueled.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie W. Dunaway

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bar
customer_reviews.text: I love the nutrient balance and taste of these bars. They give me energy without a sugar drop like many bars.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Meitner

customer_reviews.title: very rich
customer_reviews.text: these are definitely meal replacement and very rich not bad tasting though.
customer_reviews.author: Angela V.

customer_reviews.title: Taste great and healthy
customer_reviews.text: These are great tasting and great for on the gooo.
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: The best raw ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect, I love the variety! I feel so much better after having one. Currently favoring the blueberry muffin flavor 😍
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Christine

customer_reviews.title: BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite bars!! It’s soft and chewy with crunchy bits of banana chip and flax seeds. Very filling and tastes like a nice banana bread.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea D Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, could be more filling. Soy free
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good. I wish they were more filling. Variety pack seems like a good value for the money. They come packaged nicely
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: I'm a big fan of Clifbar.
customer_reviews.text: But these are the real deal. Much more meatier (I am a vegan almost a year). I use that term with folks who have ever eaten meat. Don't miss it, but the adjective meatier fits.
customer_reviews.author: eggschillin

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement loaded with protein!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the variety pack. Great to have in the car, especially when you aren't near any place where you can buy food. Awesome for backpacking!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yum, and quite filling (small meal)
customer_reviews.text: Yep like em, not too hard the eat either like some really dry protein bars..
customer_reviews.author: SHAUN

product_meta.title: PROBAR - Meal Bar, Superberry and Greens, Non-GMO, Gluten-Free, Certified Organic, Healthy, Plant-Based Whole Food Ingredients, Natural Energy (12 Count)
product_meta.description: Flavor:Superberry & Greens| Size:3 Ounce (Pack of 12)"This Superberry & Greens meal replacement nutrition bar has a rich, healthful greens blend with spinach, spirulina, broccoli and more veggies. It also has a superfruit blend, with pre- and probiotics to keep your tummy begging for more. PROBAR maintains a strong commitment to quality, sustainability, and fantastic taste by creating delicious, convenient, healthy, plant-based organic food products from Non-GMO sources."
feature_bullets: GLUTEN-FREE AND SOY-FREE: Safe, sustainably-sourced ingredients provide the benefits of a gluten-free and soy-free diet

9g PROTEIN AND 5g FIBER (See Nutrition Information on package for total fat and saturated fat content.): Energy from PLANT-BASED protein and fiber from CHIA and FLAX SEEDS keep you moving whether at work or adventuring
360 CALORIES: A clever mix of NATURAL ingredients work to provide healthy energy and a quick, filling meal on-the-go
ORGANIC INGREDIENTS: Made-With Organic Oats, Organic Nuts, Organic Seeds and contains between 70%-95% organic ingredients. So you can feel good knowing you are feeding your body with safe nutrients
NON-GMO PROJECT VERIFIED: All PROBAR products are Non-GMO Project Verified

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
